alert.note: Alert for Fayette (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 13 at 11:03PM CDT until July 13 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN FAYETTE COUNTY... At 1102 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Oelwein, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Stanley around 1110 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Highway 93 And County W 14, Donnan, Highway 93 And County V 68, Randalia, Richfield, Highways 3 And 187 and County Road W 45 And 187. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
